title: Japanese Conversation Completion Quiz - Hard Mode
description: Complete the blanks in these Japanese conversation snippets. This quiz tests your ability to understand and use conversational Japanese effectively.
instructions: Type the appropriate word or phrase in Japanese using Romaji to complete the sentence.
The case (uppercase or lowercase) of your answer does not matter, as long as the spelling is correct.
After completing all questions, submit your answers for scoring.

items.question: Watashi wa kinou, _______ o mita. (Yesterday, I watched a movie.)
Raishuu no doyoubi ni _______ ni ikimasen ka? (Shall we go to the beach next Saturday?)
Kare wa _______ de shigoto o shite iru. (He works at a bank.)
Kono hon wa _______ ni tsuite desu. (This book is about history.)
Watashi wa mainichi _______ o nonde iru. (I drink coffee every day.)
Kanojo wa _______ o benkyou shite imasu. (She is studying economics.)
Kyou, watashi wa _______ de hirugohan o tabemashita. (Today, I ate lunch at a restaurant.)
Kare wa _______ ga jouzu desu. (He is good at playing the guitar.)
Watashitachi no kaisha wa _______ o yushutsu shite imasu. (Our company exports electronics.)
Kono supaaketto wa _______ made yatte imasu. (This supermarket is open until midnight.)
